existing_features.title: Add a visible “Hashtags” block on the customer-facing website that displays the following hashtags exactly as provided: #budhladafastfood, #veg momos, #budhladabestmomos, #budhladabestrestaurant, #dilkhush, #devishhyadav. Use English for any surrounding label text (e.g., section title), and render each hashtag as readable text (optionally as pill/chip styling) without altering the hashtag content.

Update the site HTML metadata to include the provided hashtags for SEO/discoverability by adding appropriate meta tags in frontend/index.html (e.g., meta name="keywords" and/or appending to the existing meta description) while keeping existing branding text intact.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add provided hashtags to the website content/metadata: #budhladafastfood #veg momos #budhladabestmomos #budhladabestrestaurant #dilkhush #devishhyadav

projectName: Add provided hashtags to website (visible + SEO metadata)
